TaskDetailsDrawer.delete-series-all-success: Deleted all tasks from task series
TaskDetailsDrawer.delete-series-sub-success: Deleted some tasks from task series
TaskDetailsDrawer.delete-series-all-error: Could not delete all tasks from task series
TaskDetailsDrawer.delete-series-sub-error: Could not delete some tasks from task series
TaskDetailsDrawer.assign-error: Could not assign user to task
TaskDetailsDrawer.unassign-error: Could not remove assignee from task
